problem_statement: Build a personal reading tracker using Vue 3 with Composition API and TypeScript on the frontend and Python/Flask with SQLite on the backend, allowing users to search and log books, track reading progress, and set yearly goals and streaks. Implement JWT authentication, integrate a mock book API from JSON data, and use Chart.js with Tailwind CSS for visualizing reading statistics and progress over time. The application must support progress updates, personal notes/ratings, and gamified elements like streaks while maintaining a clean, intuitive interface for book enthusiasts.
